amendment.description: Amendment sought to stike section 738 regarding a requirement for public-private competition.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in the Congressional Record to stike section 738 regarding requirement for Public-Private Competition.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 268 (Roll no. 586).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Price (GA).
